content:
That's a great focus! Makeup tutorials are a popular and engaging type of content, and it's wonderful that you've seen success with them so far.

By focusing on makeup tutorials, you can establish yourself as an expert in that area and attract a dedicated audience interested in learning new techniques and staying up-to-date on the latest trends. You can also experiment with different types of makeup tutorials, such as:

* Everyday natural looks
* Glamorous evening looks
* Trendy seasonal looks (e.g., summer, winter, holiday-inspired)
* Product reviews and comparisons
* Tips and tricks for specific skin types or concerns (e.g., acne, aging, hyperpigmentation)

Remember to keep your tutorials engaging, informative, and easy to follow. You can also consider collaborating with other beauty influencers or brands to reach new audiences and stay inspired.

What's your favorite type of makeup tutorial to create, or is there a specific area you're excited to explore further?
